description: Justin Dean & Zack Grayson are sharing a room in college. Justin was nervous about having to share a room with someone he doesn't know, but to his surprise he actually enjoys Zack's company. He is actually quite the perfect guy. It's too bad he's straight and has a girlfriend. One night Zack comes home and tells Justin that he got dumped. Justin explains how he's there for him emotionally and physically. Zack confesses how he's been curious about what it would be like to fuck a guy.  They start kissing which leads to sucking each other's dicks then, finallly, some hot fucking. Once Zack bursts into climax he realizes he will not be going back to women ever again!
title: Secret Fuck Buddies
